description.value:
You gain your mystery's initial revelation spell. Casting this spell progresses your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.ibX2EhKkyUtbOHLj]{Oracular Curse}. Use the minor curse from your mystery, but when you progress it again, instead of your mystery's moderate curse effect, you become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} in addition to the effects of the minor curse.

If you don't have one, you gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point. You can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.OSefkMgojBLqmRDh]{Refocus} by reconciling the conflicting nature of your mystery, which also reduces your curse to minor.
